definitions.definition: Showy , bold or audacious in behaviour , appearance , style , etc.; ostentatious .
Referring to the final stage of French Gothic architecture from the 14th to the 16th centuries.
Of a blade : forged in a wavy , undulating pattern, like a flame-bladed sword or a kris .

main_definition: Showy , bold or audacious in behaviour , appearance , style , etc.; ostentatious .
secondary_definitions: ( architecture ) Referring to the final stage of French Gothic architecture from the 14th to the 16th centuries.
Of a blade : forged in a wavy , undulating pattern, like a flame-bladed sword or a kris .
